articles.author: Dani Anguiano
articles.title: Smoke from Canadian wildfires hits Norway and flows to southern Europe - The Guardian
articles.description: Researchers used a model to predict how the smoke would move through the region and said it wouldn’t pose a health risk
articles.content: Smoke from Canadian wildfires that has descended upon parts of the eastern US and Canada in a thick haze has drifted over Norway and is expected to hit southern Europe, Norwegian officials said on Fr… [+7492 chars]
